title: LoL is making my pc crash! Please help me!
body:
My pc has crashed twice today, Once in loading screen and once right after loading screen. 
Specs: Intel(R) i7 CPU 860 @2.80GHz 2.80 GHz
4gigs of ram (cant remember name)
nvidia gtx 970
I am running x64 Windows 7 Ultimate.
The only thing "linking" the 2 games is that  the enemy team had {{champion:107}} 
Please help me!
edit: What i did do a few days ago is i added led lighting to my case but that shouldn't do anything...

replies.body:
Yikes, it's one thing for League to have an error and crash. It's something much more important if your entire PC is crashing when League it running. Sometimes when a pc shut down in the middle of a game it can be attributed to overheating or some type of system hardware failure. 

There's quite a few different things that could be causing this, but we can first check to make sure no background programs are the issue by running a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3). If that doesn't help, we might need to address this further one on one in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
